title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 11/11/2022 INC#1559

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1559; 08:39PM; 989 S St Andrews Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ynREs4; #Koreatown; Firefighters arrived to find a previously burned home with heavy fire showing. Crews employed defensive tactics (from the exterior) to pour copious amounts of water onto the flames. It took over 70 firefighters one hour and five minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 BC18 BC5 BC705 CM20 CM22 E11 E211 E227 E229 E235 E26 E261 E27 E29 E6 E61 EM11 HR3 RA35 RA61 T11 T27 T29 T35 T61 UR27 UR88; CH7; 14 16; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1559; 07:34PM; 989 S St Andrews Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ynREs4; #Koreatown; Two-story single family home (previous burn) with heavy fire showing. Defensive mode.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 E11 E229 E26 E261 E29 E61 RA35 RA61 T29 T61; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0202; 04:38AM; 7820 N Ampere Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UQPf34; #SunValley; It took 28 firefighters 34 minutes to extinguish the flames consuming a one-story home. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E290 E7 E81 RA89 T39 T90; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0202; 04:04AM; 7820 N Ampere Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UQPf34; #SunValley; One-story single-family home with heavy fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E290 E7 E81 RA89 T39 T90; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0323; 07:02AM; 728 S Hartford Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cn0c8T; #Westlake; It took 36 firefighters to access, confine, and extinguish fire that involved contents on the second floor, and spread to the walls and attic of a boarded-up two-story home, in 18 minutes. Firefighters pushed flames back away from an adjacent apartment building, containing the damage to the unit of origin. Four occupants were found inside the home and evacuated, but declined on-scene medical evaluation. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E203 E209 E210 E211 EM11 RA10 RA11 RA811 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T3; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0323; 06:44AM; 728 S Hartford Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cn0c8T; #Westlake; Two-story craftsman with fire on the second floor. Offensive mode.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E203 E209 E210 E211 EM11 RA10 RA11 RA811 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T3; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Complete Physical Rescue; INC#0440; 09:15AM; 17700 W Plummer St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tli37K; #Northridge; Firefighters arrived to find a three-vehicle collision, with two patients trapped. Using hydraulic rescue tools (Holmatro), firefighters extricated both patients. A total of four patients were transported to area hospitals. Unknown age/gender. (Conditions: 1 critical, 1 serious, 1 moderate, and 1 fair.) LAPD Inc #1085. Nothing further.; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E273 E287 E70 E87 EM15 HR3 RA107 RA70 RA72 RA73 RA87 RA896 T73 T87 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#0440; 08:35AM; 17700 W Plummer St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tli37K; #Northridge; Traffic collision resulting in 4 patients total, 2 requiring extrication. Plummer Street to be temporarily closed near White Oak Ave. LAPD Inc #1085.; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E273 E287 E70 E87 EM15 HR3 RA107 RA70 RA72 RA73 RA87 RA896 T73 T87 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Auto vs. Pedestrian - Fatality; INC#0254; 05:48AM; 2520 S Robertson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3WPJPXC; #MidCity; A vehicle fatally struck two pedestrians (both approximately 60 year-old males). LAFD Firefighter-Paramedics arrived quickly to find, sadly, both were beyond medical help. LAPD Inc # 563. Nothing further.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; E43 E58 RA43 RA58; CH4; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Full River Rescue; INC#1553; 05:22PM; 2750 E Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zZvQoB; Boyle Heights; This incident has moved deep into the County of Los Angeles and Incident Command is transitioning to LA County Fire Department with LAFD Air Ops remaining on scene to assist. All LAFD ground resources are being released. For further updates, follow @lacofdpio . No further details.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 BC705 CM20 CM22 E209 E21 E221 E25 E3 E9 EM1 EM11 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 HA4 HR3 RA17 RA2 SC1 SW44 SW89 T21 T9 UR88; CH5; 13 14; Margaret Stewart
